review.title: Nice hotel and area
review.reviewText: Great hotel with spacious rooms.  I only needed to stay two nights, but for a longer stay this would be perfect with a full kitchen.  My only complaint is the continental breakfast is less than desirable.  There was coffee, fruit, oatmeal, and granola bars.  I was disappointed and so was my child.

review.title: Terrible room and service
review.reviewText: Room cleanup only once a week, room conditions are terrible. no further comment

review.title: two star
review.reviewText: Breakfast was instant oatmeal and coffee. Really! Bathroom floor was dirty.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  I sincerely apologize that you did not have a comfortable stay.  To uphold our company’s high standards, I will retrain our front desk staff on our check-in procedures and will make sure we are thoroughly inspecting our linens and mattresses.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Conveniently Uncomfortable
review.reviewText: We selected the hotel based on it's location to Menlo Park where we were attending a conference. We typically stay in 4-5 star hotels, with boutique hotels being our favorites. We were shocked to find anything three stars or above were well over $400/night. The gentleman who checked us in, muddled through the process, taking quite a long time to process a reservation that had been prepaid. Our room was out-dated and extremely dark. However, unless we wanted a smoking room, no other rooms were available. In all fairness the room was clean and had been freshly painted. However, when we retired for the night we noticed the sheets were stained, thread-bare and very scratchy. We would have switched hotels, but by this time there was little availability and the cost was ridiculous. We had booked for a two night stay. The room had not been serviced, perhaps as it was an extended-stay. I ended up purchasing a set of sheets for us to sleep on. The bed was also hard and uncomfortable. We could hear every sound from the hall way and as we were on the street level, we were unable to open our drapes for more light, as we were located near the front of the hotel and could see everyone entering the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: The location was close to our conference site.
review.negativeRemarks: New beds, sheets and lighting. Perhaps sound proofing the rooms.
review.locationRemarks: Half an hour away from San Francisco and 10 minutes to Sanford University.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I am so glad that you had a great stay!  I truly appreciate your kind comments regarding our spacious rooms and fully equipped kitchens.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.title: Nice staff, nice, clean rooms.
review.reviewText:
Overall it was another good experience.  I will be using this hotel each time I am driving through.
It's normally very quiet.
review.positiveRemarks: Size of the room, able to pay cash deposit, quiet, has kitchenette's in rooms.
review.negativeRemarks: The barking dog at the end of the hallway on the first floor(manager's room).
review.locationRemarks: Right off Freeway(101).  Nothing around to walk to, but can drive to many restaurants/places to eat.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I’m so pleased to read that you had a great stay at our hotel and enjoyed our friendly customer service.  I truly appreciate your comments regarding our fully equipped kitchens and our convenient location.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.title: Amazing Staff
review.reviewText: We arrived later than expected and Patricia checked us in quickly provided us with directions to the event that we were attending she was just a fantastic person to deal with made everything so easy in what was a very eventful weekend for me. I would highly recommend staying here it is clean has a kitchen for cooking if you need that.
review.positiveRemarks: STAFF is super helpful and nice.
review.locationRemarks: It was close to Starbucks, Jamba Juice and some local shopping.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay. We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I am disappointed to hear that our amenities were not to your expectations.  In response to your feedback, I will make sure we are clearly communicating our amenities during guest arrivals.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Looks better in pictures than in person
review.reviewText: Overpriced.  Dull location.  No gym.  'Breakfast' consists of oranges, apples (the red-delicious type), coffee, snack bars, and instant oatmeal.
review.locationRemarks: Restaurants are located el camino real.  Starbuck's about 3 blocks north.  Crunch gym offers a $15 daily pass.

managementResponses.response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  Please accept our apologies for the cleanliness issues you experienced.  To uphold our company’s high standards, I will be reviewing our cleaning and room inspection procedures with our staff.  Our team is committed to satisfying our guests, so we are very thankful for your feedback.  We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience at our hotel the next time you're in town.

review.title: Save your money and stay somewhere cheaper!
review.reviewText:
This was the dirtiest hotel I have ever stayed in!  Anything covered in fabric was sticky and filthy, carpet disgusting.   The bed was the worst.  There was a dirty imprint on top of the bedspread in the shape of a large body, and a permanent indentation in the mattress that matched.  It looked like someone had an "extended stay" in our room, come back every evening after work and flopped down in the same spot to watch TV . . . then stayed there for hours.  Had the rest of the room not been so filthy we would have asked for another room, but I don't think it would have made a difference.  I couldn't imagine that other rooms would have been that different.

The corridors and room smelled moldy and musty.  The staff wasn't exactly rude, they just didn't smile or speak.  No one asked us how are stay was when we checked out.  They either didn't care or were afraid of what the answer would be!

That we had to pay $195.00 for this room is unbelievable to me!  I guess its a question of supply and demand in the area.  Save your money and go stay at a local, budget place instead.  Or bring your own cleaning supplies!
review.negativeRemarks: Gut the place and refurbish all the rooms.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I’m so pleased to read that you had a great stay at our hotel!  I truly appreciate your kind comments regarding our friendly staff and comfortable rooms.  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.reviewText: If your traveling for business this is the place to stay. Rooms are big, clean and hotel staff is great.

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond.  Please accept our apologies that your stay was not to our company’s high standards.  In response to your feedback, I will make sure we are clearly communicating our amenities during guest arrivals.  Thanks to your feedback, we can continue to work on providing an exceptional stay for all of our guests.  We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience at our hotel the next time you're in town.

review.title: Long ways from business schedule.
review.reviewText: Miss lead about where location was. Not being familiar with the area I thought when they posted this hotel in the San Francisco/San Carlos area it would be near South San Francisco where I had to go for my business. Nothing was said about not making bed or changing towels everyday. The breakfast was a pick and go. No protein and not many choices.
review.negativeRemarks: Better description of the hotel and be more accurate about the facts
review.locationRemarks: Nothing around or close by. I wasn't there to look for things to do.

managementResponses.response: The staff and I read your comments about your stay with us.  We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I am disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations.  In response to your feedback, I will work with our staff to make sure we are responding to guest needs in a timely manner as well as making sure we are thoroughly inspecting rooms.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Where Not to stay
review.reviewText: Stayed at location based on past experiences with this chain. This was unlike any of the other hotels in the chain. It was nearly impossible to get a hold of an attendant at night and during the day, there was only one poor attendant manning the front desk that was pulling multiple duties. In addition, there was mold in our shower and no spare sheets or extra pillows for a studio room with a fold-out sofa/sleeper.

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond.  I sincerely apologize for the billing and cleanliness issues you experienced.  Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we will make sure we are thoroughly inspecting rooms as well as reviewing our billing procedures to ensure your experience is not repeated.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Don't book this hotel
review.reviewText: There were some dog wastes in front of our room door, and we did not know where were they come from. We asked front desk to help for cleaning up around 10 pm, but no one came to clean up until morning. The most awful thing is that they CHARGED us $75 for the dog wastes when we checked out. TERRIBLE!

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond. The situation you described is unacceptable, and I sincerely apologize for your experience. As this hotel’s manager, I can assure you that I have taken appropriate action with our staff to ensure your experience is not repeated. Your feedback is very important to us, so thank you for sharing.

review.title: Very Disappointed/Not What you'd Expect!!
review.reviewText: First off, the hotel staff sucked. The night guy Joel was rude and did not do anything about things we asked for or needed. We never received items asked for or additional help from anyone else. Second, the room was not clean and the bathroom shower/tub was disgusting. The stove in the room was not cleaned; you could see food, seasoning, and grease on the stove. The bathroom shower/tub was not clean; it was dirty on the walls/tiles, floor, and around the corners of the tub; very gross. Third, the bed was awful. I could not even sleep comfortably, yet alone at all because any move...and I mean any...the bed would squeak so bad.
review.positiveRemarks: Nothing. It was not even worth the price of 110.00 a night!
review.negativeRemarks: Everything...hotel staff, cleanness of room, and better quality of bed.

managementResponses.response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am proud of our staff for meeting your expectations and providing you with exceptional customer service.  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.reviewText: This was a very pleasant surprise!  The room was exceptionally clean, easy to locate and the staff went above and beyond!  I would highly recommend this place to anyone in the area.  Only down side was the continental breakfast, absolute bare minimum.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. The situation you described is unacceptable, and I sincerely apologize for your experience. To make sure this doesn't happen again, I am coaching our staff. Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention.

review.reviewText:
Not happy with this hotel and experience!
Staff not helpful at all!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review. I sincerely apologize for the service and cleanliness issues you experienced. I will use this comments as a training tool to ensure you experience is not repeated. I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Thank you again for your feedback.

review.title: ants in bathroom
review.reviewText: Could be a fluke, but I've never had that experience before and I travel a lot so having a parade of ants on the bathroom floor and counter is a huge strike against this hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: The receptionist was borderline rude and arrogant to us upon arrival. I was with others who noticed this as well.
review.locationRemarks: Near SFO, 1/2 hour from Half Moon Bay. Located in corporate/industrial area along the 101.

managementResponses.response: Your review for our hotel was recently brought to my attention. Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we will use this as a training tool to make sure your experience is not repeated. We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.

review.reviewText: Pigeon feathers next to the bed, and woke up with tick bites.

managementResponses.response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am thrilled that we were able to accommodate your needs with a home away from home experience!  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.title: Excellent motel for a great price.
review.reviewText: Excellent motel, very clean, convenient, very great value.  I will definitely stay here again on my business trips to the Penninsula.   Makes the high-end hotels around the SFO airport look very overpriced.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for providing us with details about your stay. I sincerely apologize for your experience. To uphold our company's high standards, we will make sure we are inspecting rooms prior to guest arrivals as well as ensuring that we are quickly responding to guest needs. Thank you for your review.

review.title: Low recommendation.
review.reviewText: Took more than 1/2 hr just waiting for someone to show up at the front desk so we can check in. When given our room we found that the bed wasn't made up, the toilet has been used and was not flushed as if someone had just used the room before we got there. Paid more than what I expected for the room.  Which wasn't really worth it.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review. The issues you described are unacceptable, and I sincerely apologize for your experience. I am working with our front desk staff to ensure that this situation does not happen again in the future. We continually work to improve our hotel, so thank you for your feedback.

review.title: Location is good
review.reviewText: Sheets were dirty, checked out early in the morning and no attendant was present despite multiple calls to the phone number guests should call to get a hold of someone.  Location was good.
